mapper.select: SELECT SLIP_CASH_GB, SLIP_DATE, SLIP_NO, CONFIRM_YN, CONFIRM_CHECK, CANCEL_REASON, DR_AMT, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = INIT_DEPT_CD) as INIT_DEPT_CD, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM T_HM1000 WHERE EMP_NO = INIT_EMP_NO) as INIT_EMP_NO FROM T_AC1110 WHERE SLIP_DATE between #{SLIP_DATE} and #{SLIP_DATE2}

SELECT SLIP_SEQ, ACC_CD, ACC_DTL_CD, (SELECT ACC_LONG_NM FROM T_AC0100 a WHERE a.ACC_CD = b.ACC_CD AND a.ACC_DTL_CD = b.ACC_DTL_CD) as ACC_NM, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE BELONG_DEPT_CD = DEPT_CD) as BELONG_DEPT_CD, DRCR_GB, ACC_AMT, DESCR, CUST_CD, (SELECT PJT_NM FROM T_SM3000_2016 c WHERE c.PJT_CD = b.PROJ_CD) as PROJ_CD, TAX_CD, PROV_AMT, VAT_AMT
FROM T_AC1120 b WHERE SLIP_DATE = #{SLIP_DATE} AND SLIP_NO = #{SLIP_NO}
